name: obs_jd
description: Observation date and time as Julian Date (JD). Derived from 'DATE_OBS'.

name: ra
description: Right Ascention (degrees) coordinate of where the telescope is pointed. Derived from 'OBJCTRA'.

name: dec
description: Declination (degrees) coordinate of where the telescope is pointed. Derived from 'OBJCTDEC'.

name: master_bias
description: Reference to the master bias used for the data reduction (indexes the Calibration table)

name: master_dark
description: Reference to the master dark used for the data reduction (indexes the Calibration table)

name: master_flat
description: Reference to the master flat used for the data reduction (indexes the Calibration table)

name: raw
description: Reference to the raw (unprocessed) file light file (indexes the raw table)

name: filename
description: Absolute path to the corresponding FITS file on the data server.

name: file_id
description: Combination of the folder date and file name to compare raw and processed files.
